```
# tasks file for roles/learnansible-example-role
- name: "Update all packages to the latest version"
  ansible.builtin.apt:
    name: "*"
    state: "latest"
    update_cache: true
  tags:
    - "skip_ansible_lint"
- name: "Install packages"
  ansible.builtin.apt:
    state: "present"
    pkg:
      - "ntp"
      - "sntp"
      - "ntp-doc"
- name: "Configure NTP"
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: "./ntp.conf.j2"
    dest: "/etc/ntp.conf"
    mode: "0644"
  notify: "Restart ntp"
```

```
# handlers file for roles/learnansible-example-role
- name: "Restart ntp"
  ansible.builtin.service:
    name: "ntp"
    state: "restarted"
```
